doc.title: Muang maya, krung tida
doc.plot: As history and memory collide, two young lovers struggle through the cultural maze of modern-day Bangkok. Through images appropriated from Floridian postcards and classic Thai movies, Dao, a Thai prostitute, and Joe, an Amerasian man, dream of becoming whole. Will Bangkok be their guide, living up to its name as the City of Angels, or are they deceived by a city of illusion?
